abstract.shortdesc: You can export the audit log which is useful for archiving it regularly so that you can examine or analyze system activity.

taskbody.context: When you export the audit log, this doesn't affect the audit log in the system.

step.cmd: When you've run an audit, click Export in the Audit tool of the Records Management Console.
step.stepresult: Depending on your browser you'll be prompted to open or save the file or it will be saved automatically. The exported audit log is an HTML file.
